mapper.select: SELECT c.vehicleCheckpointCode AS vehicleCheckpointCode, c.driverId AS driverId, c.vehicleCode AS vehicleCode, c.vehicleArrivalDate AS vehicleArrivalDate, c.vehicleShipmentDate AS vehicleShipmentDate FROM k3_tb_vehicle_checkpoint as c;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k3_tb_vehicle_checkpoint ( vehicleCheckpointCode, driverId, vehicleCode, vehicleArrivalDate, vehicleShipmentDate )VALUES( #{vehicleCheckpointCode}, #{driverId}, #{vehicleCode}, #{vehicleArrivalDate}, #{vehicleShipmentDate} )
